snippet: Talking with three players in the New York Times Oscar pool who've gotten the top six categories right for each of the last two years.
abstract: Talking with three players in the New York Times Oscar pool who've gotten the top six categories right for each of the last two years.

headline.main: Think You Can Beat Them?  Readers Who Get the Top Categories Right
headline.print_headline: The Aces of the Oscar Pool Show Their Hand
